headerDisplay: This Homebridge plugin uses Solax API service to obtain real-time info of your inverters.

tokenId.title: TokenID from Solax
tokenId.description: Users get information from Solax Cloud through the granted tokenID. Please obtain your tokenID on the API page of Solax Cloud.

pollingFrequency.title: Polling frequency (seconds)
pollingFrequency.description: Plugin data polling frequency from Solax Cloud (in seconds).

smoothMeters.title: Add accessories for smooth meters?
smoothMeters.description: Enable this option to create accessories for smoothing raw values read from Solax Cloud.

smoothingMethod.title: Smoothing method
smoothingMethod.description: Statistical method for smoothing power consumption data.

pureHomeApp.title: Add "pure" Home app accessories?
pureHomeApp.description: Enable this option to create light ambient sensors for power consumption.
